trans-unit.source: Provides a component editor base class for Web server controls that are derived from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供组件编辑器基类派生自的 Web 服务器控件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: A component editor provides a user interface for editing the properties of a control.
trans-unit.target: 组件编辑器提供一个用户界面编辑控件的属性。

trans-unit.source: Component editors are invoked from control designers by using the **Property Builder** menu item from the context menu on the control.
trans-unit.target: 都通过使用调用控件设计器上组件编辑器**属性生成器**从上下文菜单控件上的菜单项。

trans-unit.source: Component editors that are derived from the BaseDataListComponentEditor class are invoked from designers derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class, and are used to edit the properties of controls that are derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList> class.
trans-unit.target: 从派生自的<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>类，并使用要编辑的属性从<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>类</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataList>派生的控件</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>的设计器调用派生自 BaseDataListComponentEditor 类的组件编辑器

trans-unit.source: For examples of such controls, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>.
trans-unit.target: 有关此类控件的示例，请参阅<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>和<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList>。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataList> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGrid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method displays a component editor for the associated control, if one can be created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>方法显示的关联控件的组件编辑器，如果可以创建一个。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.GetInitialComponentEditorPageIndex%2A> method returns the index of the initial page to be displayed in the component editor.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.GetInitialComponentEditorPageIndex%2A>方法返回的初始页后，可以在组件编辑器中显示的索引。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.GetInitialComponentEditorPageIndex%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: A designer that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner> class creates a component editor that is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> class, when the user selects **Property Builder** from the context menu within the designer.
trans-unit.target: 派生自的设计器<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>类创建派生自的组件编辑器<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor>类，当用户选择**属性生成器**从设计器中的上下文菜单。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListDesigner>

trans-unit.source: The index in the array of page control types, of the initial page to display.
trans-unit.target: 中的页控件类型，要显示的初始页的数组的索引。

trans-unit.source: Edits the specified component by using the specified context descriptor and parent window.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的上下文说明符和父窗口中编辑指定的组件。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A> method gets a <xref:System.Type> array of page control types by using the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>方法获取<xref:System.Type>页使用的控件类型的数组<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages%2A>方法。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.WindowsFormsComponentEditor.GetComponentEditorPages%2A> </xref:System.Type> </xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor.EditComponent%2A>

trans-unit.source: It creates a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm> object, and then calls its <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm.ShowForm%2A> method to display the component editor.
trans-unit.target: 它将创建<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm>对象，然后调用其<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm.ShowForm%2A>方法以显示该组件编辑器。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm.ShowForm%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Design.ComponentEditorForm>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object that can be used to gain additional context information.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"> </xref>可以用于获取附加上下文信息的对象。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Object> implementing the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"></xref>, which represents the component to edit.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Object>实现<xref href="System.ComponentModel.IComponent"> </xref>，它表示组件编辑</xref:System.Object>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window"></xref> that represents the parent window.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.IWin32Window"> </xref>表示父窗口。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> the component was successfully edited; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>已成功编辑组件;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the index of the initial page to display in the component editor.
trans-unit.target: 获取要在组件编辑器中显示的初始页的索引。

trans-unit.source: The initial page is specified when the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor> object is created.
trans-unit.target: 指定的初始页时<xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor>创建对象。</xref:System.Web.UI.Design.WebControls.BaseDataListComponentEditor>

trans-unit.source: The index of the initial page in the array.
trans-unit.target: 数组中的初始页的索引。
